name: Stockholm
description: Stockholm, the capital city of Sweden, is known for its beautiful archipelago, stunning architecture, and rich history. The city is spread across 14 islands connected by over 50 bridges, offering picturesque waterfront views. Stockholm is home to the Royal Palace, the official residence of the Swedish monarch, and the Vasa Museum, which displays a preserved 17th-century warship. The city also boasts a vibrant culinary scene, with a mix of traditional Swedish cuisine and modern gastronomy.

foods.name: Meatballs
foods.description: Traditional Swedish meatballs served with lingonberry sauce and mashed potatoes.

foods.name: Gravlax
foods.description: Cured salmon served with mustard sauce and dill.

foods.name: Raggmunk
foods.description: Swedish potato pancakes often served with lingonberries and pork.

foods.name: Smörgåstårta
foods.description: A savory sandwich cake made with layers of bread, seafood, meats, and vegetables.

foods.name: Princess Cake
foods.description: A classic Swedish cake made with layers of sponge cake, pastry cream, and a dome of whipped cream covered with green marzipan.

foods.name: Kanelbullar
foods.description: Swedish cinnamon buns flavored with cardamom.

restaurants.name: Frantzén
restaurants.description: A three-Michelin-star restaurant offering modern Scandinavian cuisine.

restaurants.name: Oaxen Krog
restaurants.description: An innovative fine-dining restaurant focusing on seasonal ingredients and Nordic flavors.

restaurants.name: Ekstedt
restaurants.description: A Michelin-starred restaurant known for its wood-fired cooking methods.

restaurants.name: Pelikan
restaurants.description: A historic beer hall serving traditional Swedish dishes in a classic setting.

restaurants.name: Operakällaren
restaurants.description: An iconic restaurant offering refined dining with a focus on Swedish and French cuisine.

restaurants.name: Gastrologik
restaurants.description: A contemporary restaurant with a farm-to-table philosophy and a creative tasting menu.

hotels.name: Grand Hôtel Stockholm
hotels.description: A luxury hotel offering elegant rooms, a renowned spa, and stunning views of the Royal Palace.

hotels.name: Nobis Hotel
hotels.description: A modern, design-focused hotel located in the heart of Stockholm.

hotels.name: Ett Hem
hotels.description: A boutique hotel offering a cozy, home-like atmosphere with personalized service.

hotels.name: Hotel Diplomat
hotels.description: A luxury hotel housed in an Art Nouveau building with views of the harbor.

hotels.name: Lydmar Hotel
hotels.description: A stylish boutique hotel known for its art collection and waterfront location.

hotels.name: At Six
hotels.description: A contemporary luxury hotel featuring modern art and high-end amenities.

transportation.name: Stockholm Metro
transportation.description: Known as the world's longest art gallery, the metro system features art installations at nearly every station.

transportation.name: Stockholm Buses
transportation.description: An extensive bus network covering all parts of the city and its suburbs.

transportation.name: Stockholm Trams
transportation.description: Tram lines offering convenient transport across the city, particularly in the central areas.
